sectionHeading: Upcoming Closures Scheduled for S Upper St and Winslow St

location: Scheduled from Wednesday May 13 thru Wednesday May 20.
Note:  This is a rescheduled closure.  The original date was Thursday May 7.
S Upper St CLOSED between Winslow St and Bolivar St for major sewer line work.
Winslow St CLOSED between Jersey St and S Upper St.
S Upper St expected to be two-way between Cedar St and Winslow St for local traffic only.
Please see the map and complete details for traffic patterns and detours.

sectionHeading: Intersection Closure Scheduled on UK Campus

location: Work currently in progress.  Expected duration thru Wednesday May 13.
The intersection of Ave of Champions at Rose St is CLOSED for major sanitary sewer line work.
Please see the map and complete details for traffic patterns and detours.
After this work is complete,  Ave of Champions will experience block-by-block full street closures between Limestone and Rose St.
